title: The permissible FSI for uses in Buffer zone of Conservation zone shall be 0
clause_text: The permissible FSI for uses in Buffer zone of Conservation zone shall be 0.1 of the gross plot area, if not specified. All development proposals shall show the existing contour lines of the land at
